title: Watch the Gap
creator_credit: Campbell Manderson, Pip Starr and SKA TV
brief_description: A sometimes-humorous report on Pine Gap and its strategic use against US military enemies. It also examines the efforts of the Nuclear Disarmament Party to uncover what exactly Pine Gap is being used for. Produced as a news story for SKA TV’s Access News, a grass-roots alternative to mainstream news and current affairs, broadcast weekly on Melbourne’s Community Television station Channel 31 since 1994.
